name: Zahra
title: Fullstack Web Developer
testimonial: Rawand is one of the special people I met, as a person and as a teammate. On a personal level, he's nice, caring, and so kind. On a work level, he's responsible, a hard worker, committed to the deadlines, helps a lot, and he has a great skills, especially when it comes to designs amd styles

name: Muhanned
title: Re:Coded Trainer
testimonial: During my time working along side Rawand, he was an excellent student that demonstrated great sense of responsibility and professionalism. He was an active participant in our classes, and was always supporting his peers. His coding skills are remarkable as he was one of the top students in the class. I highly recommend him as I am certain that he will continue to do great and creative things in his future.
